column4: erm... maybe it will sound newbish.. but why does apt-get update && apt-get dist-upgrade does not upgrade my dapper to edgy ?? :(

erm... maybe it will sound newbish.. but why does apt-get update && apt-get dist-upgrade does not upgrade my dapper to edgy ?? :( can someone answer quickly? maybe i need to change my sources.list ???
on the "new in edgy" page, it says to run: gksu "update-manager -c"   then click update
you may want to wait a day or two, the download speeds are currently far from optimal
